title: Postdoc Opportunity – Karolinska Institutet
description:
Lab: Furlan Lab, Karolinska Institutet
Location: Stockholm, Sweden
 Shared via the Friends of Cortex Network 

The Furlan Lab is recruiting a postdoctoral researcher to map and functionally interrogate brain–body circuits that control metabolism and internal state. The position sits at the interface of neuroscience, metabolism, and systems biology, using viral tracing, neuromodulation, and transcriptomics in a highly collaborative environment.

 For more information and link to portal, click Read More below.
